problem_names:
lemma mono_Union:
assumes "mono Retr"
shows "Union (Retr ` Theta) \<le> Retr (Union Theta)"

lemma mono_Un:
assumes "mono Retr"
shows "Retr theta Un Retr theta' \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un theta')"

lemma sym_Union:
assumes "\<And>theta. theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> sym theta"
shows "sym (Union Theta)"

lemma sym_Un:
assumes "sym theta1" and "sym theta2"
shows "sym (theta1 Un theta2)"

lemma simul_Union:
assumes "mono Retr"
and "\<And>theta. theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr theta"
shows "simul Retr (Union Theta)"

lemma simul_Un:
assumes "mono Retr" and "simul Retr theta1" and "simul Retr theta2"
shows "simul Retr (theta1 Un theta2)"

lemma bisim_Union:
assumes "mono Retr" and "\<And>theta. theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> bisim Retr theta"
shows "bisim Retr (Union Theta)"

lemma bisim_Un:
assumes "mono Retr" and "bisim Retr theta1" and "bisim Retr theta2"
shows "bisim Retr (theta1 Un theta2)"

lemma bisim_bis[simp]:
assumes "mono Retr" 
shows "bisim Retr (bis Retr)"

lemma bis_raw_coind:
assumes "mono Retr" and "sym theta" and "theta \<subseteq> Retr theta"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

lemma bis_prefix[simp]:
assumes "mono Retr"   
shows "bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (bis Retr)"

lemma bis_coind:
assumes *: "mono Retr" and "sym theta" and **: "theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un (bis Retr))"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

lemma bis_coind2:
assumes *: "mono Retr" and 
**: "theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un (bis Retr))" and 
***: "theta ^-1 \<subseteq> Retr ((theta ^-1) Un (bis Retr))"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

lemma bis_raw_coind2:
assumes *: "mono Retr" and 
**: "theta \<subseteq> Retr theta" and 
***: "theta ^-1 \<subseteq> Retr (theta ^-1)"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

lemma mono_bis:
assumes "mono Retr1"  and "mono Retr2"
and "\<And> theta. Retr1 theta \<subseteq> Retr2 theta"
shows "bis Retr1 \<subseteq> bis Retr2"
translations:
lemma mono_Union:
assumes "mono Retr"
shows "Union (Retr ` Theta) \<le> Retr (Union Theta)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
have "\<forall> theta' \<in> Retr ` Theta. theta' \<subseteq> Retr (Union Theta)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>theta'\<in>Retr ` Theta.
       theta' \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>theta'\<in>Retr ` Theta.
       theta' \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
unfolding mono_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta theta'.
     theta \<subseteq> theta' \<longrightarrow>
     Retr theta \<subseteq> Retr theta'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>theta'\<in>Retr ` Theta.
       theta' \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>theta'\<in>Retr ` Theta. theta' \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta'\<in>Retr ` Theta. theta' \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma mono_Un:
assumes "mono Retr"
shows "Retr theta Un Retr theta' \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un theta')"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Retr theta \<union> Retr theta' \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta')
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Retr theta \<union> Retr theta' \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta')
unfolding mono_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta theta'.
     theta \<subseteq> theta' \<longrightarrow>
     Retr theta \<subseteq> Retr theta'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Retr theta \<union> Retr theta' \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta')
by (metis Un_least Un_upper1 Un_upper2)

lemma sym_Union:
assumes "\<And>theta. theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> sym theta"
shows "sym (Union Theta)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (\<Union> Theta)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> sym ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (\<Union> Theta)
unfolding sym_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow>
  \<forall>x y. (x, y) \<in> ?theta \<longrightarrow> (y, x) \<in> ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       (x, y) \<in> \<Union> Theta \<longrightarrow>
       (y, x) \<in> \<Union> Theta
by blast

lemma sym_Un:
assumes "sym theta1" and "sym theta2"
shows "sym (theta1 Un theta2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (theta1 \<union> theta2)
using assms sym_Union[of "{theta1,theta2}"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym theta1
  sym theta2
  (\<And>theta.
      theta \<in> {theta1, theta2} \<Longrightarrow>
      sym theta) \<Longrightarrow>
  sym (\<Union> {theta1, theta2})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (theta1 \<union> theta2)
by auto

lemma simul_Union:
assumes "mono Retr"
and "\<And>theta. theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr theta"
shows "simul Retr (Union Theta)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. simul Retr (\<Union> Theta)
proof-

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. simul Retr (\<Union> Theta)
have "\<forall> theta \<in> Theta. theta \<subseteq> Retr theta"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>theta\<in>Theta. theta \<subseteq> Retr theta
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>theta\<in>Theta. theta \<subseteq> Retr theta
unfolding simul_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> ?theta \<subseteq> Retr ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>theta\<in>Theta. theta \<subseteq> Retr theta
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>theta\<in>Theta. theta \<subseteq> Retr theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. simul Retr (\<Union> Theta)
hence "Union Theta \<subseteq> Union (Retr ` Theta)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta\<in>Theta. theta \<subseteq> Retr theta

goal (1 subgoal):

  \<Union> Theta \<subseteq> \<Union> (Retr ` Theta)

also

  \<Union> Theta \<subseteq> \<Union> (Retr ` Theta)

goal (1 subgoal):

have "... \<subseteq> Retr (Union Theta)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
using mono_Union assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono ?Retr \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Union> (?Retr ` ?Theta) \<subseteq> ?Retr (\<Union> ?Theta)
  Bisim.mono Retr
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
unfolding mono_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta theta'.
     theta \<subseteq> theta' \<longrightarrow>
     ?Retr theta \<subseteq> ?Retr theta' \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Union> (?Retr ` ?Theta) \<subseteq> ?Retr (\<Union> ?Theta)
  \<forall>theta theta'.
     theta \<subseteq> theta' \<longrightarrow>
     Retr theta \<subseteq> Retr theta'
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)
by auto

this:
  \<Union> (Retr ` Theta) \<subseteq> Retr (\<Union> Theta)

finally

proof (chain)

using this:

lemma simul_Un:
assumes "mono Retr" and "simul Retr theta1" and "simul Retr theta2"
shows "simul Retr (theta1 Un theta2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. simul Retr (theta1 \<union> theta2)
using assms simul_Union[of Retr "{theta1,theta2}"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  simul Retr theta1
  simul Retr theta2
  \<lbrakk>Bisim.mono Retr;
   \<And>theta.
      theta \<in> {theta1, theta2} \<Longrightarrow>
      simul Retr theta\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr (\<Union> {theta1, theta2})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. simul Retr (theta1 \<union> theta2)
by auto

lemma bisim_Union:
assumes "mono Retr" and "\<And>theta. theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> bisim Retr theta"
shows "bisim Retr (Union Theta)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (\<Union> Theta)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> bisim Retr ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (\<Union> Theta)
unfolding bisim_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> sym ?theta \<and> simul Retr ?theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (\<Union> Theta) \<and> simul Retr (\<Union> Theta)
using sym_Union simul_Union

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  ?theta \<in> Theta \<Longrightarrow> sym ?theta \<and> simul Retr ?theta
  (\<And>theta.
      theta \<in> ?Theta \<Longrightarrow> sym theta) \<Longrightarrow>
  sym (\<Union> ?Theta)
  \<lbrakk>Bisim.mono ?Retr;
   \<And>theta.
      theta \<in> ?Theta \<Longrightarrow> simul ?Retr theta\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> simul ?Retr (\<Union> ?Theta)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (\<Union> Theta) \<and> simul Retr (\<Union> Theta)
by blast

lemma bisim_Un:
assumes "mono Retr" and "bisim Retr theta1" and "bisim Retr theta2"
shows "bisim Retr (theta1 Un theta2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (theta1 \<union> theta2)
using assms bisim_Union[of Retr "{theta1,theta2}"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  bisim Retr theta1
  bisim Retr theta2
  \<lbrakk>Bisim.mono Retr;
   \<And>theta.
      theta \<in> {theta1, theta2} \<Longrightarrow>
      bisim Retr theta\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bisim Retr (\<Union> {theta1, theta2})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (theta1 \<union> theta2)
by auto

definition bis where 
"bis Retr \<equiv> Union {theta. bisim Retr theta}"

lemma bisim_bis[simp]:
assumes "mono Retr" 
shows "bisim Retr (bis Retr)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (bis Retr)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (bis Retr)
unfolding mono_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta theta'.
     theta \<subseteq> theta' \<longrightarrow>
     Retr theta \<subseteq> Retr theta'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bisim Retr (bis Retr)
by (metis CollectD assms bis_def bisim_Union)

corollary sym_bis[simp]: "mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> sym (bis Retr)"
and simul_bis[simp]: "mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr (bis Retr)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Bisim.mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> sym (bis Retr)) &&&
    (Bisim.mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr (bis Retr))
using bisim_bis

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono ?Retr \<Longrightarrow> bisim ?Retr (bis ?Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Bisim.mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> sym (bis Retr)) &&&
    (Bisim.mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr (bis Retr))
unfolding bisim_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono ?Retr \<Longrightarrow>
  sym (bis ?Retr) \<and> simul ?Retr (bis ?Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Bisim.mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> sym (bis Retr)) &&&
    (Bisim.mono Retr \<Longrightarrow> simul Retr (bis Retr))
by auto

lemma bis_raw_coind:
assumes "mono Retr" and "sym theta" and "theta \<subseteq> Retr theta"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  sym theta
  theta \<subseteq> Retr theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
unfolding mono_def bis_def bisim_def simul_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>theta theta'.
     theta \<subseteq> theta' \<longrightarrow>
     Retr theta \<subseteq> Retr theta'
  sym theta
  theta \<subseteq> Retr theta

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta
    \<subseteq> \<Union>
                 {theta. sym theta \<and> theta \<subseteq> Retr theta}
by blast

lemma bis_prefix[simp]:
assumes "mono Retr"   
shows "bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (bis Retr)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (bis Retr)
by (metis assms bisim_bis bisim_def simul_def)

lemma bis_coind:
assumes *: "mono Retr" and "sym theta" and **: "theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un (bis Retr))"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
let ?theta' = "theta Un (bis Retr)"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
have "sym ?theta'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (theta \<union> bis Retr)
by (metis Bisim.sym_Un sym_bis assms)

proof (state)
this:
  sym (theta \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  sym (theta \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
have "?theta' \<subseteq> Retr ?theta'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<union> bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
by (metis assms mono_Un Un_least bis_prefix le_supI2 subset_trans)

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<union> bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  sym (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta \<union> bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta \<union> bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
using * bis_raw_coind

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta \<union> bis Retr \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  Bisim.mono Retr
  \<lbrakk>Bisim.mono ?Retr; sym ?theta;
   ?theta \<subseteq> ?Retr ?theta\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?theta \<subseteq> bis ?Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<subseteq> bis Retr

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma bis_coind2:
assumes *: "mono Retr" and 
**: "theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un (bis Retr))" and 
***: "theta ^-1 \<subseteq> Retr ((theta ^-1) Un (bis Retr))"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
let ?th = "theta Un theta ^-1"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
have "sym ?th"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)
by (metis sym_Un_converse)

proof (state)
this:
  sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr

proof (state)
this:
  sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
have "?th \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un (bis Retr)) Un Retr (theta ^-1 Un (bis Retr))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
    \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
                Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
using ** *** Un_mono

proof (prove)
using this:
  theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
  \<lbrakk>?A \<subseteq> ?C; ?B \<subseteq> ?D\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?A \<union> ?B \<subseteq> ?C \<union> ?D

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
    \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
                Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
              Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
also

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
              Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
have "... \<subseteq> Retr ((theta Un (bis Retr)) Un (theta ^-1 Un (bis Retr)))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
    Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
    \<subseteq> Retr
                 (theta \<union> bis Retr \<union>
                  (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr))
using * mono_Un

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  Bisim.mono ?Retr \<Longrightarrow>
  ?Retr ?theta \<union> ?Retr ?theta'
  \<subseteq> ?Retr (?theta \<union> ?theta')

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
    Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
    \<subseteq> Retr
                 (theta \<union> bis Retr \<union>
                  (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr))
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
  Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
  \<subseteq> Retr
               (theta \<union> bis Retr \<union>
                (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
also

proof (state)
this:
  Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) \<union>
  Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
  \<subseteq> Retr
               (theta \<union> bis Retr \<union>
                (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
have "... = Retr (?th Un (bis Retr))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Retr
     (theta \<union> bis Retr \<union>
      (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)) =
    Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
by (metis Un_assoc Un_commute Un_left_absorb)

proof (state)
this:
  Retr
   (theta \<union> bis Retr \<union> (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)) =
  Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
have "?th \<subseteq> Retr (?th Un (bis Retr))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
    \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
have "?th \<subseteq> bis Retr"

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> bis Retr
using assms bis_coind

proof (prove)
using this:
  sym (theta \<union> theta\<inverse>)
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse>
  \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
  Bisim.mono Retr
  theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
  \<lbrakk>Bisim.mono ?Retr; sym ?theta;
   ?theta \<subseteq> ?Retr (?theta \<union> bis ?Retr)\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?theta \<subseteq> bis ?Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> bis Retr
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> bis Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  theta \<union> theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> bis Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<subseteq> bis Retr

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma bis_raw_coind2:
assumes *: "mono Retr" and 
**: "theta \<subseteq> Retr theta" and 
***: "theta ^-1 \<subseteq> Retr (theta ^-1)"
shows "theta \<subseteq> bis Retr"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr

have "theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta Un (bis Retr))" and 
  "theta ^-1 \<subseteq> Retr ((theta ^-1) Un (bis Retr))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) &&&
    theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bisim.mono Retr
  theta \<subseteq> Retr theta
  theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr) &&&
    theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
by(metis mono_Un le_supI1 subset_trans)+

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
using * bis_coind2

proof (prove)
using this:
  theta \<subseteq> Retr (theta \<union> bis Retr)
  theta\<inverse> \<subseteq> Retr (theta\<inverse> \<union> bis Retr)
  Bisim.mono Retr
  \<lbrakk>Bisim.mono ?Retr;
   ?theta \<subseteq> ?Retr (?theta \<union> bis ?Retr);
   ?theta\<inverse>
   \<subseteq> ?Retr (?theta\<inverse> \<union> bis ?Retr)\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?theta \<subseteq> bis ?Retr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. theta \<subseteq> bis Retr
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  theta \<subseteq> bis Retr

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma mono_bis:
assumes "mono Retr1"  and "mono Retr2"
and "\<And> theta. Retr1 theta \<subseteq> Retr2 theta"
shows "bis Retr1 \<subseteq> bis Retr2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bis Retr1 \<subseteq> bis Retr2
by (metis assms bis_prefix bis_raw_coind subset_trans sym_bis)
end
